content: Run haxe code in discord! See pin in <#663246792426782730> for a description on how to use this
An introduction tailored to the channel framework, leave the parameter empty or specify the framework `!rtfm heaps`
Type a channel to recieve notifications from key people within those communities when big things change

Prints documentation of the inputted package and/or field. Usage Examples: 
	1) `!api haxe.Json` 
	2)`!api haxe.Json parse`
	3) `!api flixel.FlxBasic active`
Hey, did you read the rules? We can't help with project/game specific issues. Please check out the appropriate discord server - https://discord.gg/YVMMkvjqhF
